Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> I also want to be clear. we do not have an agreement yet that allows us to say this is solved. i think it would be better to strike some cooperation that can make the best mining accessible to as many as possible and keep CPUs and GPUs an option. if we can't find a way that we believe is good for the community, we will have to fork with an algo that bricks them. everyone should know, as we do, that that will also postpone and likely complicate any ultimate solution

Author: Gateway#3763

I dont think this is something that can be fought and more time will be spent on "forking" and less time will be spent on the actual project. If it aint broke dont fix it. It's like trying to fork away from newer GPU's or CPU's because the hashrate is much higher. Embrace change or you will be left behind and become another project that has no volume.
